Name: Fireball
Description: Shoots a small fireball at the enemy

Name: Lightning Bolt
Description: Zaps the enemy with the power of lightning

Name: Icecicle
Description: Drops an icecicle on the enemy from above

Name: Dark Obliteration
Description: Conjures shadows to crush foes, inflicting heavy damage.

Name: Inferno
Description: Engulfs enemies in flames, causing widespread damage.

Name: Magic Explosion
Description: Creates a huge explosion using the full power of the user's magic.
